title: Musk's xAI accuses rival OpenAI of stealing trade secrets
description: (Reuters) -Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI has sued rival OpenAI in California federal court for allegedly stealing its trade secrets to gain an unfair advantage in the race to develop AI technology.
content:

title: From 4% To 20%: Women's Enrolment Goes Up Fourfold In AI, Machine Learning Courses In 2025
description: Women's enrolment in technical education has gone up by 17% in 2025 from 4% in 2022, with the most prominent uptick observed in deep-tech fields such as artificial intelligence (AI), prompt engineering, cybersecurity, robotics, and data science, according to a report released on Thursday.

title: Caveonix Appoints Michael Hallinan as Vice President of Artificial Intelligence
description: TYSONS, Va., Sept. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Caveonix, the AI-driven cyber compliance platform trusted by government agencies and large enterprises to deliver 100% compliance, 100% of the time, today announced the appointment of Michael Hallinan as Vice President of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Michael will lead Caveonix's agentic AI innovation and development through expansion of the platform into a distributed, AI-first, cloud-native platform.

title: Spotify to tackle AI abuse with transparency measures
description: The music streaming service Spotify has unveiled several measures to encourage artists and publishers to be more transparent about their use of artificial intelligence, as well as to limit certain abuses.
content:

title: Databricks, OpenAI team up to deliver AI models for enterprise clients
description: (Reuters) -Analytics firm Databricks said on Thursday it has partnered with OpenAI to integrate the ChatGPT maker's artificial intelligence models into its platforms for enterprise customers.
content:

title: AI will soon have a say in approving or denying Medicare treatments
description: Taking a page from the private insurance industry's playbook, the Trump administration will launch a program next year to find out how much money an artificial intelligence algorithm could save the federal government by denying care to Medicare patients.

title: Adding a lookup step makes AI better at assigning medical diagnosis codes
description: A new study by researchers at the Mount Sinai Health System suggests that a simple tweak to how artificial intelligence (AI) assigns diagnostic codes could significantly improve accuracy, even outperforming physicians. The findings, reported in NEJM AI, could help reduce the time doctors spend on paperwork, cut billing errors, and improve the quality of patient records.

title: Musk’s Grok AI Cleared for Use Across US Government Agencies
description: Elon Musk’s xAI signed a new agreement to expand access to its artificial intelligence chatbot Grok to the federal government, the General Services Administration announced Thursday.
